24 Feb

From 1 April in Russia, social pensions will be increased

  • 24 FS 2024
  • Editorial
  • 53
  • Leave a comment.

The average social pension from 1 April 2024 will increase by 938 roubles and 13,455 roubles. Children with disabilities will receive pensions of 1,392 roubles, an average of 19,948 roubles. Persons with disabilities in 1 group since childhood 20,110 roubles, persons with disabilities, 18,236 roubles. Pensions for the loss of the breadwinner to the children of the military will increase to 15,999 roubles.
